statements: DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 101 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_records WHERE age > 40 AND surgical_history LIKE '%appendectomy%';
DELETE FROM surgical_history WHERE patient_id = 100 AND surgery_type = 'Appendectomy';
DELETE FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_id = 100 AND patient_id = 1;
DELETE FROM surgical_history WHERE surgery_type = 'Appendectomy' AND surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM surgical_history WHERE patient_id = 100 AND surgery_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM surgical_history WHERE patient_id = 202 AND surgery_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SurgicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 100 AND surgery_id = 10;
